title: Update Command Files for Script Integration
description: Modify existing .claude/commands/*.md files to call Python scripts internally instead of pure LLM operations. Maintain backwards compatibility while adding script acceleration.
notes: Update commands to: 1) Call validation gates before/after operations, 2) Use task-manager.py for JSON operations, 3) Use bootstrap.py for template detection, 4) Add fallback to LLM if scripts fail. Special focus on breakdown.md integration.
assumptions: Scripts installed and available in PATH
decision_rationale: Command file integration ensures scripts are actually used in workflows. Transparent to users while providing performance benefits.
